website_summaries.verdict: Our top pick: a higher-quality microscope than most students use in high school and college, and at a decent price.
pros: Incredible magnification (up to 2000x), clarity and durability in a home microscope
cons: Unit starts to fail at highest magnification levels

customer_reviews.title: Do not order!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this scope! I bought 5 of these microscopes last year and only 2 of them are still working! The 3 scopes that are not working and now just taking up space is because the LED light doesn't seem to have a good connection to receive power. I can remove the lens and push down on the light bulb and the led will flicker. This is definitely a mechanical issue with the scope. I will not be purchasing anymore of these scopes.
customer_reviews.author: DermLab, L.

customer_reviews.title: Not working on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this as mine came broken. The mechanical stage doesn't work properly (turning the knob does not always move the stage). So it's been a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ginseng

customer_reviews.title: Fried in the first 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Electronics in the base fried after less than 5 uses. Complete waste money. Can't return to Amazon as it's out of return time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Pure Natural Diva

customer_reviews.title: Consider this Microscope if your looking to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this microscope. I am a histology student and it (along with some slides I purchased) is perfect for studying. The quality is definitely the same if not better than the ones we have at the college :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the trouble
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this microscope 3 or 4 times before the LED bulb completely stopped working. Go figure that it's been impossible to find a replacement bulb for this exact model, even going through OMAX the maker of the microscope they do not carry the bulb for this model microscope.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great microscope
customer_reviews.text: I worked in a lab in college and this microscope works just as good, if not better, than the one I had used. We purely use it for hobby, and we have a great time with it. We get water from ponds, puddles, blades of grass, specs of dirt. It's so entertaining and educational to see what is growing beyond what we can see with the naked eye. Our 4 year old loves picking thing up from the house and yard and checking them out under the scope. So much fun and such a great value for the price. Overall it's been a great addition, and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Bought as home-microscope gift for biomedical lab scientist student.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister-in-law who is a biomedical laboratory student. She is used to working with much more expensive/hearty equipment. That being said, she was very pleased with the product. She is used to a heavier feel, so she did make a comment about the weight not feeling right. In the end, shouldn't matter since it does as advertised: gives a great microscopic view of specimens. No issues with shipment or quality. Really good price when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: spungez

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope, professional quality
customer_reviews.text: The Scope is about 2/3 the size of the ones we use in our Microbiology department, but I can't tell any difference in image quality and resolution. The controls are actually smoother and easier to use, and the eyepiece width modification works a lot better with this model. I can't recommend it highly enough. If I were to criticize one thing, it would be the power adaptor, which is thin and not a full-size electrical cord like most industrial models.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Family

customer_reviews.title: purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how cool microscopes were until I got this for my niece. This one in particular is easy to setup, use, and steal back from a 9 year old girl. There are two focus adjustments knobs which is extremely convinient. Does not come with slides, so, I recommend buying sample slides or blank slides to put stuff on. Also does not come with instructions, but as I stated earlier, it is very easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thavongsy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Bio at my college and instantly became fascinated with the microscopic world. I wanted to have a microscope of my own and found this one to be extremely affordable. I wasn't expecting much based on what I payed, you know "you get what you pay for for." I was shocked when I started using it and realized it exceeded my expectations. It was better than the $2000+ microscopes I used at my school. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a good affordable microscope.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Grado

customer_reviews.title: Pro Quality for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: We love, love this microscope. The quality is excellent and worth a lot more than they are currently charging. They also have top notch customer service if you need it. The user manual is online for download and there is an introduction video on youtube [...] . I recommend ordering some prepared slides to have when the microscope arrives (it does take a bit longer coming from California - but totally worth it). We bought "AmScope 50 PC Zoology Botany Entomology Prepared Microscope Slides in Wooden Case" on Amazon and it has been a great experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: pashopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Microscope
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent microscope and a great price. My son, who is 12 years old, assembled it quickly and started enjoying slides immediately. We did go to the website to learn all the microscope's features and how to take good care of it. I am very happy with this purchase and I would recommend it to anyone looking for this type of instrument. It is definitely not a toy. It is a quality piece of equipment that I am sure he will use up to and past college.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ankeny

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll be glad you did
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase. I've only had it for a few weeks, but I love. It has compact design that is great for a small area. The light is bright and the resolving power is excellent. The stage is good. It's a little (very little) hard to focus perfectly at greater magnifications than 1000x, but my no means frustrating or unusable. This is really the only con, but at only $210 and free shipping with prime it's a great deal. Comparing this to other microscopes I've used it's probably a 4 out of 5, but a whole lot less expensive. So for the price vs. function this is worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Scope this out
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son, who had a cheapo microscope that was very frustrating. He loves this one. The function is convenient, the viewing is clear, the magnification works well. He takes it to high school and the other kids use it as it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lenses dirty on arrival, rainbows everywhere with any magnification at or over 1000x
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing buy. I so very much impressed with this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing buy. I so very much impressed with this microscope it was bought for my daughter and I have say that I would recommended to anyone looking to expand your kids educational opportunities and in this case my daughter's Santa's list. The price is great and quality appears solid. The oil is in fact included thats great!
customer_reviews.author: epoe74

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work, LED isnt lighting up
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed that the product came and doesnt work, the adaptor has power same for the powe switch but the LED isnt lighting up!! i couldnt find much help online or on the company's website.
customer_reviews.author: Ramy B

customer_reviews.title: Exceelent
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my 12 year old grandson. He loves science and math. Since diagnoses with type 1 diabetes, his goal in life is to find a cure. He is starting 8th grade in January and is getting heavy into biology and research. After reading reviews on this prodouct I thought it would be an excellent starter microscope for him. His mother agreed after seeing it and using it a little to get the feel of it. She also said it is an excellent product for him. Very pleased. Would shop only at amazon for this type of product. More than met expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This scope is an excellent instrument for the price
customer_reviews.text: This scope is an excellent instrument for the price. The optics are actually better than the scope I used as a medical student that cost 3 times as much. The company is also very helpful and easy to reach; they immediately sent a replacement base to remedy a problem with the light source.
customer_reviews.author: yamos

customer_reviews.title: Great educational tool
customer_reviews.text: The microscope was a gift to grandchildren; the only thing I don't like about it is that it did not come with glass slides or pipettes that would make it interesting to collect things to look at. We'll have to find those items elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Winfree Andrew

customer_reviews.title: This is a really cool instrument, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool instrument, especially for the price. I'd advise thinking twice about seeking a 2000x scope, though. For non-medical/professional use, most everything you'll want to look at will fall into the 40X-800X range. Things get pretty sensitive beyond that (i.e., extremely shallow depth of field).
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would have been helpful if you would have included some instructions
customer_reviews.author: Winona E.

customer_reviews.title: A professional microscope at an amateur price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional quality microscope, as good as any of the ones I have used in my research in graduate school and at work. I tried all the objectives out, including the oil-immersion, and everything worked exactly as expected. This is the most versatile microscope I have found for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent image, robust build, a joy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This microscope is a remarkable value. It's a robust piece of precision equipment. It's a treat to have a binocular microscope. The X/Y knobs for adjusting the position of the stage allows for smooth navigation across the slide. Great light source with dimmer and adjustable iris. Truly a fine instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Herschel Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade microscope at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful microscope! I was looking for a professional grade microscope just like I used in my job in the lab area of a veterinarian practice that wasn't too expensive, and this matched my criteria perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: This is a very high quality microscope for a very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality microscope for a very decent price. I have experience in microbiology, molecular biology, pathology and day-to-day clinical labs and have used a number of scopes.
customer_reviews.author: rb123

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easily set up and used, does not require an elaborate booklet to do so. Binocular vision is so much easier on the eyes! Wish there was beginner's literature explaining what to get for accessories and what their uses are, but that is a minor issue thanks to YouTube. Great microscope,
customer_reviews.author: Condor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and quality
customer_reviews.text: The microscope has been useful and we could not be happier with its optical quality. It has proven highly useful as an inexpensive analysis tool for smaller optics where a visual analysis often proves difficult. It is versatile and flexible allowing us to using it in several applications. John S.
customer_reviews.author: LaffDeb

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my 16 year old as a present ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 16 year old as a present. He loves it! It has its own light source and you can have a full visual of samples since you can look through both eyes.
customer_reviews.author: analorena

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: As as homeschool mom, I bought this microscope for my 10-year-old daughter. It is way more than I expected! It endured the shipping to the Philippines (everything was intact), easy to use, and I know she'll be using it until she goes to college. This thing is pretty high-end, images are sharp, and the LED lighting is adjustable to the brightness of your choosing. Customer service is prompt when I emailed them. I thought I had a problem with the LED light, but it turns out, we just turned the dimmer to its lowest level that's why there wasn't any light. I'm a very satisfied customer and happy with my purchase! Especially happy with the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, the stage is well designed and the unit is well made for any University or High School scope. It has a good feel to it and is not so large that you need a booster seat. The utube videos are something necessary for the optimal adjustment process. Not sure who wrote the paper instructions. They tried. The vid is better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a micro class I am taking. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KrisNev

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  We all love it.
customer_reviews.text: We homeschool our 6 kids and they love this microscope. From the oldest ones doing biology and chemistry to the youngest not yet in school, it's just fun to use. I like that it seems to be well built and the mechanical stage is smooth and steady. It could take my kids through high school and possibly college.
customer_reviews.author: Momof8

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: It seems really blurry regardless on which lens I'm using and how focused it is
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: Nice scope except fine focus fails as stage reaches its upper limits, now you have to use coarse focus most of the time a hassle but still usable. It was a gift and the father did not want to return it. I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Magruder C. Beall

customer_reviews.title: The slide holder and guide doesnt cover the heighth and ...
customer_reviews.text: The slide holder and guide doesnt cover the heighth and width of a sedgewick rafter slide which makes it almost impossible to scan and/or count a standard slide size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner microscope for all of my nieces and nephews
customer_reviews.text: I'm a poor graduate student, but I wanted to get something fun and educational for my nieces and nephews for the holidays. I got the kids this microscope, and they enjoy it immensely! They will continue to grow and learn with this scope, which is a quality microscope for the bills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull Microscope
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this microscope. It has many great features and is a very well built and very high quality microscope. I would recommend this to anybody looking to find a nice scope for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: it's the real thing
customer_reviews.text: more than you expect for the price -- this is not a toy, but for the price, you don't mind gifting it to a child around 9-10 years and up. it really works and the description is accurate. I highly recommend for your young, aspiring scientist
customer_reviews.author: regularGUY

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing microscope! I don't believe that it is a $1000 professional laboratory grade microscope as stated, but nonetheless is performs wonderfully! I have no complaints about the operation of any part of this microscope and LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Got this as a graduation gift for a bio-tech major friend of mine and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: james karl  krantz

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent microscope. As a dog breeder is has been ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent microscope. As a dog breeder is has been an essential piece of equipment for me. It is excellent quality and craftsmanship and very easy to use. One of the best microscopes I've used in years.
customer_reviews.author: Echoman007

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Don’t buy this microscope! It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It arrived and doesn’t work! My mistake was that I didn’t try it right away and no can’t return it! Absolute garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Berktold

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Microscope
customer_reviews.text: Lots of adjustments and magnification level. Bought the amscope 100 slide set with it and it was every bit as advertized. Decent sturdy built as well. Can't go wrong....and better investment than 4 latest xbox games.
customer_reviews.author: insightful

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 30 year old daughter who is studying biology in college. I had no idea what I was buying and didn't want to get her something for grade school children. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great for an introduction into microbiology
customer_reviews.text: This microscope is good for the price. I do have trouble keeping a focused image at the higher magnification but that could be me learning to use the microscope properly. It's a great beginner microscope.
customer_reviews.author: Pete I.

customer_reviews.title: omax scope
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple this scope has all the features I need Super scope with unbelivable clarity With a price that is so doable Low price and impressive binocular microscope
customer_reviews.author: SHANE H.

customer_reviews.title: Top-of-the-Line College Level microscope
customer_reviews.text: After looking at specs and reviews for several different microscopes, I chose this one because of it's features and because it compares closely to other microscopes that are 5-10x more expensive. It arrived on time, was securely packaged, and undamaged. It reminds me of the microscope that I used in high school Biology, but with twice the features. The microscope is a well-designed, well-put-together piece of equipment that I'm proud to own.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Interpupillary Distance impossible to adjust for my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6"2' & apparently my eyes are set much wider than the nice folks who made this. It's not much of a big deal since I also purchased the "AmScope MU300 3.0MP USB2.0 Microscope Digital Camera" so it takes up one eye-piece anyway. I really like the quality & their YT videos helped a little but I would much rather have gotten a real response from the company regarding the Interpupillary Distance / Focal Lengths problem. The eyepiece diopter only adjusts so far & no matter what setting I'm unable to get a single image. I gave them 4 out of 5 but you may not feel the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Abitaskew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my homeschooled daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a super microscope. Very well made with lots of magnification. The Binocular is really a lot more fun to use even though its a little trickier to adjust between users. Overall this was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great focus but sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly!! I love it! Great focus but sensitive! Wish it could focus sharp at 100X but still pretty damn good! I love collecting blood it's a thrill to see the cells moving!!
customer_reviews.author: a sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Binocular microscope
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding instrument at a phenominal price! This is the second purchase I've made. It has added features like double layer mechanical stage and the binocular component for easier viewing. Get 'em while you can, folks!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lohmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microscope
customer_reviews.text: I’m a veterinary technician and farm animal sanctuary President. I use this to check for parasite checks on our farm animals. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Little Bear Sanctuary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality microscope
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microscope. It is the first real microscope I have ever owned and I think it is a great piece of equipment for your home lab. I am very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Kat

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: it is well worth the money, does exactly what it claims it is. Use it at home, its not like at work in the lab, but it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: maf lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up. Easy to use. Clear images on all settings. Easy to focus on all powers. I recommend this microscope. Images were clearer than my college biology microscope and it was much easier to use. The instruction manual was missing from the box otherwise this would get 5 stars. I looked it up online.
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality microscope for a good price. I had another microscope that I was able to charge and so it was portable. My only complaint with this one is that it has to be plugged in to work so it's not quite as portable. Other than that I've been pleased with my purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Einsteinium123

customer_reviews.title: Omax microscope
customer_reviews.text: It is very good. I did find some nice little critters in the bathroom sink. Scary. Overall I loved. Can't bet the price is one reason I bought it. 80% off? $1200.00 down to less than $200.00? Scope is very powerful and very sturdy. It is not a toy type machine. It is a professional type and I wanted the best of best. I'm using for the fun of it. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnsa

customer_reviews.title: Great microscope for a college student
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality microscope,This microscope offers high-end features at an affordable price,images are very sharp and clear, with great resolution,has a lot of great features,easy to set up,High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: A very fine intrument except for a very limited depth of field.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with the quality of the microscope. The contruction is robust and the controls wouk smoothly. The only negative is that the depth of field seems to be strangely short.
customer_reviews.author: scifijunkey

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value Scope
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sixth grader for Christmas to help generate more interest in science. Boy did it work! She absolutely loves this scope. It is solidly constructed and very easy for her to transport. The mechanical stage glides smoothly and the objectives are clear and powerful. We have not utilized the oil immersion objective yet but I have no doubt that it will work flawlessly. Excellent quality and value scope for the money! Don't hesitate if you're contemplating purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Works great for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Works great for at home use. We area farm that uses this for doing fecals on goats and sheep.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a brew lab. Has all the features we need. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMAX Microscope
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with fast delivery of the OMAX MICROSCOPE that ordered. Needed it within 4 days and was delivered the next day. Thanks you made my grandson a happy boy on xmas. The quality of the scope it very good a far cry from the I was using on a Xmas day. If i remember all I could see was a eye lash.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Product never worked...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter for her birthday. We didn't use it right away because my daughter was in and out of town and I hadn't bought slides and what not... It stayed in the box in her closet unopened. When we did finally take it out to use it, it did not work. I figured it was too late to return it because we waited so long to open it. Needless to say, I wasted over $200 on a product we'll never use. Not to say that it wouldn't have been a great microscope, but we'll never know as it never worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost daily. Optics are good, maintenance is easy, and I get the answers I need with it. Prompt shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the price. Biggest bang for the buck I could find!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Willms

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality microscope bought it for my 13 year old future scientist she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyfromtheblock

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent microscope for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent microscope for the price. There are no great differences in quality compare with more expensive microscopes.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Figueredo

customer_reviews.title: Great Microscope
customer_reviews.text: The microscope was everything I needed for my first microscope. I haven't had it that long but I use it almost everyday. It is very well made and not flimsy. I would recommend this to anyone one hunting for your first microscope that isn't a toy. Buy it you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When I was a young girl I experienced the pleasures of looking into a microscope. Well I am a mature woman now and finally ordered a microscope from OMAX. When the microscope arrived it had a broken lense. When I contacted the company the Customer Service Representive, Kelvin, was most helpful and friendly. The replaced lense arrived quickly. And, once again I was able to explore the wonders of microscoping. Thank you Kelvin of OMAX.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i love this product and the packaging. the quality is excellent, and i will get many hours of use from it
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wiz

customer_reviews.title: great scope for hom
customer_reviews.text: I've found this to be just right for my home use. I plan on using it with my grandkids as they explore life. So far, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool microscope
customer_reviews.text: Its a great microscope for a beginner. Good quality build, strong and durable. Comfortable viewing, and the picture quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceship Door Gunner

customer_reviews.title: arrived with a non functioning light
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and the LED under the base was not functional. I did contact support and they were extremely quick in attempting to help, unfortunately it was a problem with the actual circuit board so we had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Microscope!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality microscope. I can view bacteria, blood cells, etc. very clearly
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Well made and solidly built. Was very easy to put together. Will be using it to do water/wastewater analysis in my lab. Great technical response as well when I had a few questions. One talks to a person!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Brewery Microscope
customer_reviews.text: Fine tuning is not all to precise. Letting go of the knob can blur subject matter. Otherwise great scope for beer yeast cell counts.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I was a bit skeptical about ordering this, but it exceeded my expectations. A truly quality instrument. The field is clear and bright. The LED light makes all the difference. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted one of these for a while. The price on Amazon was great. My inner nerd is very happy with this. The quality and performance of this product is much better than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Best microscope I've ever used. (We do not use professionally)
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality. We used it Christmas day with our grand-children. They loved seeing all the things in the pond water.
customer_reviews.author: M. Connon

customer_reviews.title: REVISIT THE VERY SMALL WORLD
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding value - truly worth 10 times the price! Need to buy slides too - inexpensive. John O. Enander 2-27-2013
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!!!!!.....great quality product!!!!!......my students use it often and have a great time with it!!!!!.....I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Maria T. Rivera Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microscope...I have always wanted one...so glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading features list (see first line)
customer_reviews.text: This scope is fantastic. I love every little thing about it. It's much higher quality than I need for the basic goofing around I'm doing at home. It has easy to reach controls for just about every adjustment you'd need to make. The image quality is fantastic. I wish the light was just a little brighter, but it's easy enough to augment. I mean, sure, there are better scopes out there, but they're not in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miller

customer_reviews.title: A+ unit
customer_reviews.text: This scope is everything as advertised. Had a problem with the higher magnify plug in eyepiece lens., they contained debris in each of the lenses. The manufacturer replaced the lenes and I sent back the bad ones with no arguement and prompt service. You could only see the debris at 2000x. Scopes have come a long way....
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very excellent OMAX 40X-2000X Lab LED Binocular Compound Microscope . Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Vargas Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an excellent value. I'm a retired microbiologist and wanted this for home interest and hobby work and it's great. You could pay a whole lot more and not gain much.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Niementowski

customer_reviews.title: Omax Microscope
customer_reviews.text: This microscope was exactly what I was looking for. Something compact to work with at home. I am very pleased with my purchase as well as the customer service provided by the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Boogerkitty

customer_reviews.title: ... a vet and she says this microscope is as good as the professional one they have at their clinic
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a vet and she says this microscope is as good as the professional one they have at their clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Howell, Intelligent Adult

customer_reviews.title: Skip these and pay a little more to get a much better quality scope
customer_reviews.text: In less than 6 months the bulbs have burned out in all of the microscopes I purchased and they were not heavily used lab equipment. I haven't been able to get any response about their supposed warranty either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of its price range
customer_reviews.text: Works great, an excellent microscope for its price range. No issues with clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Costa

customer_reviews.title: Love this microscope but, there is one negative that we didn't realize when buying!
customer_reviews.text: I got this microscope for my Son for Christmas. He is a Senior in High School and getting ready for College so, he knew this was something he could use for a long time. We absolutely love it, it is amazing how things look under the scope. As for the negative part, I was really shocked that the microscope didn't come with any glass slides. These are what you need to be able to look at anything. So, you have to buy the glass slides seperately. To me, that is like buying a car with no tires, these are the things that you need to make the item work correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Not full of it (dishonest) LIKE AmScope garbage brand!
customer_reviews.text: Actually 1000x magnification with the 10x occulars and the 100x objective len, unlike the AmScope dog poop that I bought before returning for this one. Thank you for being honest OMAX. This scope is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Ninjago

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microscope was was amazed. Great value,works great. Got slides with it great way to start to use it and understand it / elanco specimen slides.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia j.kerber

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Operate
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the oil-filled highest magnification object lens to work. They did supply an oil tube, but I can't seem to get any light at all through the lens using it. The others work fine, but focus is quite delicate and you may spend an hour getting one good shot at the 300x magnification.
customer_reviews.author: Hobson Lane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas, we were amazed at the quality, especially for the money. I am glad, however, that i found out before Christmas morning that it doesn't come with any slides. Even though the price is good still without the slides, most people would assume it would come with a couple and the description isn't very clear that it doesn't, but all in all, A+++
customer_reviews.author: Chris and De McDonald

customer_reviews.title: This scope is very nice, solid!!
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted a microscope, and this one seemed to fit my need. I honestly have not had the right amount of time to play with it, but everything does work, and the price was right. It has clear, defined viewing table.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Is this a Good device? Ask my daughter in Grand Rapids MI
customer_reviews.text: I am an Electrical Engineer by back ground, but I know a little bite about science. Is this a Good device? Ask my daughter in Grand Rapids MI. She is the lab director of a Hospital. THAT IS SUPER COOL!! IT HAS STAGING AN EVERY THING! Bought it on Amazon. Always buy 2!. One is in Azorean . The other one is here. I have not decided what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: A good deal.
customer_reviews.text: For two hundred dollars I cannot imagine a better deal. Images appeared bright and stable. This microscope would have cost 900 dollars only ten years ago--and would not have performed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Fidler

product_meta.title: OMAX 40X-2000X Lab LED Binocular Compound Microscope with Double Layer Mechanical Stage and Coaxial Coarse/Fine Focusing Knob
feature_bullets: Total magnification: 40X-80X-100X-200X-400X-800X-1000X-2000X; Eyepieces: wide field WF10X and WF20X; Objectives: achromatic DIN 4X, 10X, 40X(S), 100X(S, Oil)

Nosepiece: revolving quadruple; Stage: double layer X-Y mechanical stage with scales, size: 4-1/2inchx 4-15/16inch (115mm x 125mm), translation range: 2-13/16inch x 1-3/16inch (70mm x 30mm); Stage upward moving lock protects objectives and slides
Condenser: NA1. 25 Abbe condenser with iris diaphragm; Illumination: transmitted (lower) LED light, intensity adjustable; Focus: Coaxial coarse and fine knobs on both sides
Full solid metal frame construction with stain resistant enamel finish; Power supply: AC/DC adapter, 7. 5V/7. 5W (UL approved) - Input: 100-240V

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
